landing.title: Reinventing the housing industry
landing.text:
A robust and new way of creating a safe online web portal
for companies and just text to put here.

introduction.title: The Problem
introduction.text:
One of our oldest clients, FORM, has hired ASRR and its developers for years to provide for their IT needs. 
Together with FORM we think about how we can realize the vision they
 have had for nearly a decade on how to revolutionize the housing industry

bullets.key:
The old process
(in a generic BIM/Architecture firm)
bullets.value: An architect manually changes chosen options for a new house for every house in a block, then generates every export separately and has to manage the huge amount of files involved.
Automate the configuration of houses using code, automatically upload exports to the cloud and open up requests for new houses to third parties.

• Complex interface with the existing program
  • Spring Boot Rest API hosted in kubernetes
  • Front-end Web App in ReactJS
  • A custom server
  • Cloud storage

result.title: What We Did
result.text:
FORM uses complex BIM models to combine smart parametric designs with a structured way of working to create the 
3D models needed to build a house. This is a perfect example of something that can be automated.
The program FORM uses to engineer and model houses is called Autodesk Revit. Revit can be a bit unreliable at times,
 which posed a threat to ensuring we can go from a manual process to a fully automated cloud version.
We wrote a program that plugs into the existing application, enabling us to imitate user interactions with code. 
This allows us to automate complex actions flawlessly. 
Using the program, we create an output within Revit, for example a PDF with the building plans.
 This pdf is then uploaded to the cloud, and its location is passed to the central server.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.text:
In short, we were able to adapt to the current process by writing code that integrates with the used programs. 
We then pushed it all to the next level by using enterprise grade methods to ensure reliability,
 speed and a good overall user experience. 
To put this into numbers, this can save hundreds of euros per house, making FORM’s Automation a cutting-edge competitor 
to big time firms while delivering consistent and reliable outputs.

web-applications.text: We create progressive web applications that give your end-user the best experience possible, using native features and offline caching combined with seamless integration with our back-end systems. Click read more for a full list of advantages!

data-analytics.text: Analysing data correctly can save any company from excess costs and inefficiency. Using our BI analytics on one of your existing or a new database, ASRR will provide insights into key aspects of your data.
